special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting (Anathema Form Only).
descriptions: The anathema's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

descriptions.raw: 3/day each: darkness, entangle, fear, haste, suggestion, polymorph
descriptions.hyperlinked: 3/day each: darkness, entangle, fear, haste, suggestion, polymorph

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance.
descriptions: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Ophidiophobia Aura.
descriptions: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

special_abilities.name: Shapechanger.
descriptions: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

special_abilities.name: Six Heads.
descriptions: The anathema has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded. charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Acid Slime.
descriptions: As a bonus action, the yuan-ti can coat its body in a slimy acid that lasts for 1 minute. A creature that touches the yuan-ti, hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, or is hit by its constrict attack takes 5 (1d10) acid damage.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Chameleon Skin.
descriptions: The yuan-ti has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

special_abilities.name: Variant: Shed Skin (1/Day).
descriptions: The yuan-ti can shed its skin as a bonus action to free itself from a grapple, shackles, or other restraints. If the yuan-ti spends 1 minute eating its shed skin, it regains hit points equal to half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack (Anathema Form Only).
descriptions: The anathema makes two claw attacks, one constrict attack, and one Flurry of Bites attack.

actions.name: Claw (Anathema Form Only).
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d6+6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Constrict.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. Hit: 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 16 (3d6+6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Flurry of Bites.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 27 (6d6+6) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.
